body: At page 8 the artist forget to draw a Eyes like golden clocks and at near the end of date a live LN (vol. 18/19 from 22 vol ), Kurumi Will confessed to Shido after having over 5000 time lapse to safe Shido from death cause by DEM and she never tried to seal her spirit and because of that Shido at the last time lapse can be saved
Guys! This Kurumi is alive! For those who don't know, Date a Bullet follows her in the "Spirit Underworld" basically the afterlife of spirits! She is currently working to reunite with shido!
This is why Kurumi is best grill.

Dammit, right in the meow. / Rarely seeing any DAL doujinshi, dissapointing, all these up coming girls and like we were already having like base of 4-6 girls on the Anime adaptation. / This art style look kinda Western, maybe thats why its not censored?
Anybody else see that pages 7-12 are the same as pages 15-20
That's why she's the best. *sobs unintentionally*

This OVA is the best :'(
Kurumi-chan~
